title: 1¬† This is the atom
text:
Atoms are the components of molecules (see Chapter 2, specially Section 2.0.1).
Atoms form the whole universe (see This is a planet and This is the Solar System).

title: 2¬† This is the molecule
text:
Molecules are are made of atoms (see Chapter 1).
